title: 1952–53 Copa México
text:
The Copa México 1952–53 was the 37th edition of the <a href="Copa%20M%C3%A9xico">Copa México</a>; the 10th edition in the professional era.
The competition started on February 15, 1953, and concluded on May 31, 1953, with the final match that give to the team <a href="Puebla%20F.C.">Puebla</a> the trophy for the second time.
